ygData.subject: War at CF
ygData.msgSnippet: (Oooh, how clever, IR.  J/K  Diplomacy will have to be adapted, reminds me of the Newcomer negotiations with the Maxis :)  Luckily ol Uni has an ace up his

Subject: War at CF
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: KSLawdogg@...

(Oooh, how clever, IR.  J/K  Diplomacy will have to be adapted, reminds me of 
the Newcomer negotiations with the Maxis :)  Luckily ol' Uni has an ace up 
his sleeve

Also, Airly, when Oblitertron seperated, Chordate and Dark One landed right 
next to each other, so unless Airly was hovering above him after Oblitertron 
detached and THEN grabbed him, he'd be safe with Windlord, but that's not the 
case, he's still inside of Dark One's jet fighter mode

Also, sorry about the wait Alloran, but I checked Egroups and found your 
reply, which I never received from egroups, along with another e-mail from 
you)


The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Double 
Punch/Beeline/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Sixshot/Ares/Vehement/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron/Firestarter/
Chordate/Chaos/Minion:



Dark One continued to gain altitude as he armed a pair of missiles, diving 
down and launching two of them downward at Liono.

---

Breakdown slowly stood up, shaking his head, still a little out of it.

---

Pyro got up slowly, raising his flame cannon, launching off two fire balls at 
Hot Spot, each missing.

---

Hiss continued lying on the ground, not wanting to get up due to pain.  He 
sighed uncomfortably and tried to push himself up in what looked like a push 
up.

---

Scavenger got up, transforming to his HUMVEE mode painfully, loading the 
cannons on the side with numerous rounds.

---

Hot Spot watched Pyro's fire balls go by and yelled.  "You piece of slag!"

The Protectobot leader transformed into his blue fire truck mode, the hose of 
the vehicle pointing at Pyro and launching a continuous burst of 
high-pressured water.

---

Groove charged forward, raising his twin vaporators, shooting a blast of 
freezing vapor at the slowly getting up Hiss.

---

Blades silently looked at Dark One, his sensors telling him a Maximal was 
inside and a prisoner.  He sighed, knowing he COULD chase after him in his 
apache mode, but he wouldn't really stand a chance against a jet fighter. 

He raised his photon pistol, firing off two blasts at Hiss.

---

First Aid raised his left arm, firing a welding laser blast from his left 
fist off at Breakdown's chest.

---

Streetwise raised his own photon pistol, firing off two blasts at the flying 
Dark One, knowing it wouldn't have a high probability of hitting.

===

Demon Wulf cursed sidestepping, a dozen of the exploding stars striking his 
thick and powerful armor, not breaking through but hurting.  He raised his 
bladed weapon, firing off another blade missile at Lilly, a purple blast of 
energy erupting from his open mouth at her.

---

Flesh Ripper jumped with his mighty legs, avoiding the cone of acid and 
plasma blasts and slamming down to the ground with a grunt, two of the 
lancers striking his chest plate and knocking him back with a vicious snarl.

He raised his left palm, forming a blue orb in his left palm, throwing it at 
Neo Bahamut, the orb having the same ability as a grenade only slightly 
stronger.  He formed a yellowish-white orb with the effects of an EMP blast, 
throwing it at Liono.

---

Dark Claw fired off a fire ball from his mouth at the incoming stars, only a 
few getting through and blowing up against Dark Claw's torso.  He cursed as 
he felt the cold, but he increased his body heat to keep himself from 
freezing, as well as Liono's fire balls that struck him, doing nothing more 
than knocking him to the right a little.  He formed a black orb in his left 
hand, throwing it at Koj, the black orb having the effect of a charge (which 
is much stronger than a grenade).  The plasma bolts struck him and knocked 
him back, piercing into his thick armor.

===

Double Punch watched as his cyberbee Beeline dived downward in the sky, 
firing off four optic blasts, intercepting both missiles heading for him and 
two heading for some other robot.

He raised his tail instantly, firing off a burst of acid to intercept most of 
the shots and explosive shells heading his way, some getting through and 
knocking him back a few feet, cutting into his exo-skeletron pretty good.  He 
raised his left pincher, launching two energy-signature seeking missiles off 
at Sideswipe.

He raised his right pincher, firing off two more energy-signature seeking 
missiles off at Torca.

---

Injector was struck with the shells, sending him flipping through the air, 
stabalizing himself easily as his exo-skeletron took a bit of damage.  He 
raised his behind, launching off two stinger missiles down at Torca.

---

Manteror was struck from the side by blasts from Grimmler and Kluster, 
knocking him out of the way of the incoming tusk missile and some shots, 
eight still taking on his thick armor.  He cursed, the pain getting more 
intense and the wounds getting worse.

He raised his left arm, firing off four ion disks down at Kluster, and raised 
the right arm.  "I'd appreciate it if you'd die." he smiled, firing off three 
ion disks at Ratchet's midsection.

---

Bumblebee flew hard left, dodging the shots but the missile getting a diret 
hit, blowing a few inches wide hole in his side.  He cursed as a steady flow 
of mech-fluid leaked. 

"You'll...pay for that...Maximal!" he yelled out in pain, raising both arms, 
firing off two stinger missiles from his left launcher at Ratchet, firing two 
more from his other weapon at Sky Lynx.

---

Sixshot watched someone's cyberbee shoot down two missiles heading for him.  
He didn't wait around to watch what happened next, jumping hard right as two 
other missiles blew up the ground where he had just been, the resulting shock 
wave knocking him through the air more than he wanted to, crashing down on an 
elbow.

He cursed loudly, getting up and firing off two blasts from both hypersonic 
concussion blasts off at Sky Lynx, immense pain coming from his right elbow 
whenever it was moved.

---

Ares ducked down to a knee, the shots going overhead but the missiles 
striking him in the chest, knocking him back on a flip, but landing on his 
knees in great pain.  He got up with a grunt of terrible pain, raising his 
grenade launcher and firing a single grenade off at Sideswipe, followed by 
three rapid optic blasts at Torca's left arm.

===

Chaos continued to drive forward at top speed, swerving hard right to avoid 
numerous lightning blasts, a few striking the body of his missile truck mode, 
frying some unimportant systems and leaving deep burn marks that had pierced 
into his form.  He fired off two five foot long missiles off at Dark Convoy, 
transforming to biped mode immediately after and landing on his two feet, 
reaching into subspace.

---

Minion drove swerved, happy about not being shot at.  He fired off 
twenty-five rapid laser blasts from his left cannon off at Liono and 
continued driving as he fired, a new target lined up, twenty-five blasts 
rining out from his right cannon at Lilly.

===

Vehement continued to fly, seeing his two soldiers close enough to hear him 
without the inner monologue communications unit.

"Brothers, the situation is worsening," he said as he looked at Nemesis 
Enforcer, Demon Wulf and his brethren, and the spot in the air where 
Oblitertron had filled the robot's view, "Sun Crusher, aid that bot, Nemesis 
Enforcer, and Refletor, aid against the old Maximal leader.  I will take on 
the Warrior of Light myself.  He is but one, I am superior to one.  To two.  
To a dozen Warrior of Lights.  Now go!" he yelled, speeding up, getting so 
close to the Key, he could taste it, the holy item teasing him with knowing 
him it was there, but possibly out of his grasp.

---

Sun Crusher watched Vehement and shrugged, raising his rifle and flying off 
towards Nemesis Enforcer.

---

Reflector sighed, heading off towards Demon Wulf and his brethren at top 
speed.

===

Nemesis Enforcer's vision returned ever so slightly and he saw a sword.  He 
almost burst out in laughter, but it hurtst a little, and he didn't want to 
feel anything more right now.  He didn't know the situation, but knew the 
Alliance would win even without him.  But his mind was far from gon jue, at 
least in the sense of being unconsciouss.

He powered up the boosters in his batlike feet, launching him along the 
ground, digging into the ground, which Nemesis knew would leave an ugly stain 
on his back until it was cleaned off after a CR use.

His body dug through the ground as the boosters blasted him away from Iron 
Raptor, away from the evil, evil sword.  The sword mocked him, but Nemesis 
would have the last laugh.  He let out a painful chuckle, unwittingly heading 
for the Protectobots and Oblitercons.

---

Scattershot watched Nemesis and sighed.  "Of course he gets out of dying. But 
if that had been me." he brought a finger to his throat, dragging it from one 
end to the other.

"Well, Nemesis really isn't worth much, Maximal witch!" he yelled down, 
raising his rifle and firing off 25 explosvie rounds down at Iron Raptor.

"You make my heart go BA-BOOM!"

===

Unitron continued flying, launching a flare to intercept the missile trailing 
him.  He transformed to biped mode, flying through the hole in the bridge, 
touching down.

The top of his left wrist opened up, revealing a barrel, a dozen rapid blasts 
tearing apart two autoguns that had started to come down from the ceiling.

He looked to his left to Firestarter, and then down to the Maximal Hysteria.

---

Firestarter touched down in biped mode, smiling at the downed at Hysteria, 
raising his left arm at her.

"Leave her.  We have more important things to do." Unitron said.

"Fine.  You are right." Firestarter replied, walking forward along side 
Unitron, who fired off more rapid laser blasts to blow apart the relatively 
weak autoguns.

===

Chordate continued to be unconsciouss, slowly starting to come out of it, 
fresh mech-fluid leaking down his face.
